snippet.title: Potato Thriller Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Potato Thriller is now available on Steam! 

Get it here: goo.gl/3V6vxb  

The Steam edition of potato thriller (Potato Thriller Steamed Potato Edition) includes exclusive content only for the steam version of the game.  Thanks everyone once again for helping the game get greenlit and made available on Steam! :D

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developer Blog: http://goo.gl/EAjzqh

Twitter: https://twitter.com/snowconesolid
